original_text: Now then rise early in the morning with the servants of your lord who came with you, and start early in the morning, and depart as soon as you have light.”
korean_text: 그런즉 너는 너와 함께 온 네 주의 신하들과 더불어 새벽에 일어나라 너희는 새벽에 일어나서 밝거든 곧 떠나라 하니라

sentences.original_text: with the servants of your lord who came with you
sentences.korean_translation: 네게 함께 온 네 주인의 종들과 함께

sentences.original_text: and start early in the morning
and depart as soon as you have light
